leaftools.leaves_to_skips¶

abjad.tools.leaftools.leaves_to_skips(expr)¶

New in version 1.1.1.

Iterate expr and change notes, rests and chords into skips.

Pass expr an an Abjad component or a Python list of Abjad components.

Return None.

abjad> staff = Staff(RigidMeasure((2, 8), construct.scale(2)) * 2)
abjad> leaftools.leaves_to_skips(staff[0])

abjad> print staff.format
\new Staff {
      \time 2/8
      s8
      s8
      \time 2/8
      c'8
      d'8
}
